results.title: Anthony Hopkins Makes It Look Simple. (And Maybe It Should Be.)
results.abstract: In the dementia drama “The Father,” the 82-year-old actor turns in a career-capping performance and yet claims, “No acting required.”

results.abstract: On TikTok, Gen Z “Harry Potter” fans edit themselves into the movies in a quest for escapism, representation and community.
